title: Fullstack Engineer
description:
• Developed and maintained a full-stack web application for managing electric car chargers

• Led the creation of a public charging app with payment systems and remote authorization

• Migrated infrastructure from IaaS to PaaS, setting up Docker Swarm and microservices

• Collaborated with firmware teams to deliver auto-updating software and seamless installations

• Consistently delivered results with a focus on problem-solving and continuous learning

title: Teacher/Organizator
description:
• Managing a week long summer school of programming and game development

• Teaching new subject basics of 2D graphics

• Creating final project and reviewing student work with constructive feedback and helping them making their final game flawless

• In overall feedback from the students, I was rated as one of the best teachers with keep mind at management and teaching/explaining things in a simple & understandable way

title: IT Support
description:

• Configuration & runtime management of network printers and IoT devices

• Network and computer security

• Security training practices

title: Fullstack Web Developer

title: Frontend Developer
